timeline.bodyText:
I don't think we want to switch that particular one because I suppose format.skip disables the formatter entirely?
We need the first build to test the format and report the errors.
timeline.author: gsmet
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -80,7 +80,7 @@ jobs:
           restore-only: ${{ github.event_name == 'pull_request' }}
       - name: Build
         run: |
-          mvn -e -B  -DskipTests=true -Dno-format -DskipDocs clean install
+          mvn -e -B  -DskipTests=true -Dformat.skip -DskipDocs clean install

timeline.bodyText: Also, I think we need to keep that one as the TCK tests are only compiled here.
timeline.author: gsmet
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -269,7 +269,7 @@ jobs:
         shell: bash
         run: tar -xzvf maven-repo.tgz -C ~
       - name: Build with Maven
-        run: mvn -B --settings .github/mvn-settings.xml -Dno-native -Dno-format -DskipTests -Dtcks install
+        run: mvn -B --settings .github/mvn-settings.xml -Dno-native -Dformat.skip -DskipTests -Dtcks install
